pullRequest.title: converted xtend code to java
pullRequest.bodyText:
converted xtend code to java
Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: Introduce a local var that is casted?

We have so many places where we convert an input stream to a String ...
org.eclipse.xtext.ui.testing.util.IResourcesSetupUtil.fileToString(IFile)
I know it's a test but a try with resources is probably better right?
Since this is noreference and noextend, can the typo be fixed? getPathes() => getPaths()
